title: Growlanser 1-3 [PS2][English]
description:
Three Growlanser games available in English for PS2. Growlanser 2 and 3 were later bundled together as Growlanser: Generations.

Pro tips for Growlanser 2 (if you use emulators): 
1: That game has some serious problems with saves. As soon as you get to the world map- save! If your save has a bad date stamp (like 00/00) LOAD it and then SAVE again. Repeat until you get normal date stamp. Later save as often as possible and if date stamp changes to 00/00 repeat the load/save process.

2: Disable spells animations- they sometimes may freeze the game

3: Game sometimes freezes after story battle (those that ends with "Mission clear/complete" animation). Save using save states just before that animation and if game freezes- reload until it's fine
